title: Refineries protest against move to allow diesel import
text: islamabad five oil refineries formally lodged protests government oil gas regulatory authority ogra allowing import high speed diesel hsd refiners said move violated decisions product review meeting forum comprising government ogra oil industry required procurement products local refineries imports joint letter ogra chairman minister secretary petroleum division five refineries attock parco national pakistan refinery cynergico said formally expressed concern regarding challenges product takes directly resulting failure oil marketing companies omcs uplift committed quantities hsd petrol especially past two months also requested ogra direct omcs uplift committed quantities pol product refineries essential smooth refineries operations actual deficit volumes imported context gas oil pakistan go request import tonnes hsd june opposed given availability excessive hsd stocks refineries allowed also evident import plan hsd finalised shared product review minutes issued ogra june contrary come notice ogra total disregard product review meeting decision allowed go import tonnes hsd pretext stock building sales current month disappointing letter said chief executives refineries said already struggling free flow smuggled products carrying huge inventories hsd punished unabated imports country kindly appreciate go preferred import hsd instead uplifting local refineries without valid reason said ogra permission import may valid refineries unwilling cater needs go omc yet imports local availability preferred ogra despite decision taken earlier refineries also challenged ogra view regarding offering competitive commercial terms omcs able reap benefit rule g pakistan oil refining blending transportation storage marketing rules unfortunately linking enforceability rule g commercial arrangement envisaged ogra defeats essence purpose said rule gives blanket approval imports omcs cost country precious foreign exchange thus compromising country energy security refineries claimed essential ensure upliftment local refineries product allowing petrol hsd imports clearly envisaged rule g pakistan oil refining blending transportation storage marketing rules refineries demanded ogra revisit decision allowing imports hsd go direct omcs including go first ensure upliftment required pol product committed quantities refineries seeking import permission keeping view volatile market conditions available stocks petrol hsd refineries ogra spokesperson said local production petrol diesel insufficient cater local consumption therefore omcs allowed import products pakistan import planning primarily done product review meeting happens one month planning month published dawn june th

title: What are the gold rates in Pakistan ahead of Eid?

title: SECP takes cognizance of ‘dubious’ car scheme
text: islamabad securities exchange commission pakistan secp taken cognizance unincorporated entity name etihad auto solutions offering car financing schemes advance payment extremely low markup rates sponsors etihad auto solutions also registered another company companies act similar name e etihad auto solutions private limited order deceive public fraudulent scheme promoted falsely claimed etihad auto solutions private limited non banking finance company nbfc registered secp secp hereby warns public deal etihad auto solutions private limited etihad auto solutions form arrangement entities neither licensed secp nbfcs allowed offering car financing services secp already initiated action etihad auto solutions private limited etihad auto solutions includes closing operations referring matter relevant law enforcement agencies general public informed certificate incorporation company merely confirms registration secp allow company raise deposits launch investment schemes copyright business recorder

title: Five remanded into police custody for chopping off camel’s leg in Sanghar
text: sanghar local court remanded five people police custody chopping camel leg sanghar sindh ary news reported sunday according ssp sanghar two five suspects namely abdul shakoor shar abid shar confessed crime probe meanwhile camel shifted karachi treatment landlord sindh sanghar district allegedly chopped camel leg punishment scavenging field fodder according police incident occurred mund jamrao village sanghar district friday soomer khan owner camel narrated incident along camel sanghar press club enmity anyone know done camel said sanghar ssp took notice incident video camel chopped leg went viral social media police officials said peasant refused identify culprit press charges hence police lodged fir behalf state unknown persons sections ppc
